author: Al Jazeera
title: 100,000 Ukrainians flee to Poland amid Russian attacks
description: Nine reception centres have been set up along border in Poland, which already has community of 1.5 million Ukrainians.
content:
The Polish government says 100,000 people have crossed the border into Poland from Ukraine since Russias invasion began on Thursday.
